title: Mark Hughes: Needless F1 team order enraged already-beaten Verstappen
summary: Max Verstappen had looked to be in with a shot of winning the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix.Mark Hughesexplains why Oscar Piastri ended up leading a comfortable McLaren 1-2 while the Red Bull F1 driver rammed into George Russell

qa_pairs.question: Which driver was involved in a collision with George Russell during the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix?
What team achieved a 1-2 finish in the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix?
In which year did the events of the Spanish Grand Prix involving Verstappen and Piastri take place?
